task: Look up the pronunciation and definition of the word \"sustainability\" on the Cambridge Dictionary.
Look up the pronunciation and definition of the word \"sustainability\" on the Cambridge Dictionary.
user_action_and_explanation: type "sustainability" into the search bar with the placeholder text 'Search English–Chinese (Traditional)' to look up its pronunciation and definition.
observation: The user successfully found the entry for "sustainability" on the Cambridge Dictionary. The pronunciations are provided: UK - /səˌsteɪ.nəˈbɪl.ə.ti/ and US - /səˌsteɪ.nəˈbɪl.ə.ti/. The primary definition given is "the quality of being able to continue over a period of time," with an additional environmental context definition as "the quality of causing little or no damage to the environment and therefore able to continue for a long time."
